name: simple-portfolio
description:
Who is this beauty?

Very simple landing-page for portfolio, used as template for experimenting with my first React-project. All images are from Unsplash, edited here in Figma. Font is called Magilio and is free for personal use.


I tend to nest and name layers exactly as I would do it in HTML, so if it doesn't make sense, please change it until it feels like your own!



Web-dev notes:

  • The menu is planned to open on click, for example with Bootstrap. Open with hover is not a reliable feature from neither an accessible nor usable perspective.
  • Background can be animated in a SVG for nice movement
  • Outline h1 with webkit-outline-stroke CSS-styling.
  • I tend to nest and name layers exactly as I would do it in HTML, so if it doesn't make sense, please change it until it feels like your own!
